Package org.apache.calcite.plan

Class RelOptQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.calcite.plan.RelOptQuery
  • public class RelOptQuery
extends Object
    A RelOptQuery represents a set of relational expressions which derive from the same select statement.
